subject: Rajasthan Geography
topic: Rajasthan ke Pramukh Bhautik Pradesh (Physiographic Divisions)
question_en: Which of the following is the Western most part of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान का पश्चिमी से सबसे पहला भाग कौन सा है?
explanation_en: Araldesh Desert is the western most part of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: अरालदेश डेजर्ट राजस्थान का पश्चिमी से सबसे पहला भाग है।

subject: Rajasthan Geography
topic: Rajasthan ke Pramukh Bhautik Pradesh (Physiographic Divisions)
question_en: Which of the following regions is known as the 'Land of Kings'?
question_hi: जो क्षेत्र 'राजाओं की भूमि' के नाम से जाना जाता है, वो है?
explanation_en: Mewar region is known as the 'Land of Kings'.
explanation_hi: मेवाड़ क्षेत्र 'राजाओं की भूमि' के नाम से जाना जाता है।

subject: Rajasthan Geography
topic: Rajasthan ke Pramukh Bhautik Pradesh (Physiographic Divisions)
question_en: Which of the following is a part of the Eastern Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान का पूर्वी भाग कौन सा है?
explanation_en: Kota is a part of the Eastern Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: कोटा राजस्थान का पूर्वी भाग है।

subject: Rajasthan Geography
topic: Rajasthan ke Pramukh Bhautik Pradesh (Physiographic Divisions)
question_en: Which of the following regions is known as the 'Thar Desert'?
question_hi: जो क्षेत्र 'थार डेजर्ट' के नाम से जाना जाता है, वो है?
explanation_en: Thar Desert is a region in Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: थार डेजर्ट राजस्थान का एक क्षेत्र है।

subject: Rajasthan Geography
topic: Rajasthan ke Pramukh Bhautik Pradesh (Physiographic Divisions)
question_en: Which of the following is a part of the Western Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान का पश्चिमी भाग कौन सा है?
explanation_en: Jodhpur is a part of the Western Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: जोधपुर राजस्थान का पश्चिमी भाग है।

subject: Rajasthan Geography
topic: Rajasthan ke Pramukh Bhautik Pradesh (Physiographic Divisions)
question_en: Which of the following regions is known as the 'Land of Marwar'?
question_hi: जो क्षेत्र 'मारवाड़ की भूमि' के नाम से जाना जाता है, वो है?
explanation_en: Marwar region is known as the 'Land of Marwar'.
explanation_hi: मारवाड़ क्षेत्र 'मारवाड़ की भूमि' के नाम से जाना जाता है।

subject: Rajasthan Geography
topic: Rajasthan ke Pramukh Bhautik Pradesh (Physiographic Divisions)
question_en: Which of the following regions is known as the 'Deshnoke'?
question_hi: जो क्षेत्र 'देश्नोके' के नाम से जाना जाता है, वो है?
explanation_en: Desert region of Marwar is known as the 'Deshnoke'.
explanation_hi: मारवाड़ का मरुस्थल क्षेत्र 'देश्नोके' के नाम से जाना जाता है।

subject: Rajasthan Geography
topic: Rajasthan ke Pramukh Bhautik Pradesh (Physiographic Divisions)
question_en: Which of the following regions is known as the 'Hadoti'?
question_hi: जो क्षेत्र 'हाड़ौती' के नाम से जाना जाता है, वो है?
explanation_en: Hadoti region is a part of Eastern Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: हाड़ौती राजस्थान का एक पूर्वी भाग है।

subject: Rajasthan Geography
topic: Rajasthan ke Pramukh Bhautik Pradesh (Physiographic Divisions)
question_en: Which of the following regions is known as the 'Mewar'?
question_hi: जो क्षेत्र 'मेवाड़' के नाम से जाना जाता है, वो है?
explanation_en: Mewar region is a part of Southern Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: मेवाड़ राजस्थान का एक दक्षिणी भाग है।

subject: Rajasthan Geography
topic: Rajasthan ke Pramukh Bhautik Pradesh (Physiographic Divisions)
question_en: Which of the following regions is known as the 'Marusthal'?
question_hi: जो क्षेत्र 'मरुस्थल' के नाम से जाना जाता है, वो है?
explanation_en: Marwar region is known as the 'Marusthal'.
explanation_hi: मारवाड़ क्षेत्र 'मरुस्थल' के नाम से जाना जाता है।
